text:
James B. Sumner

(1887-1955)

American chemist (1887-1955) – James B. Sumner was born in Canton (Town in Massachusetts, United States) on November 19th, 1887 and died in Buffalo (City and county seat of Erie County, New York, United States) on August 12th, 1955 at the age of 67. Today James B. Sumner would be 136 years old.

Age how old was James B. Sumner when he died? 67 James B. Sumner died in 1955 at the age of 67.
